H0.text: Which singer-actress played 'Evita' in the 1996 film of that name. Whitney Houston

H1.text: Which singer-actress played 'Evita' in the 1996 film of that name. Barbra Streisand

H2.text: Which singer-actress played 'Evita' in the 1996 film of that name. Cher

H3.text: Which singer-actress played 'Evita' in the 1996 film of that name. MADONNA

A4.text: After being cast, she undertook vocal training and studied Argentina's history of and Perón's life.

A5.text: Madonna's portrayal earned her the Golden Globe Award for Best Actress in a Motion Picture – Musical or Comedy.
